description:
An old hunter fights to protect his village from vermin.
When Momoka dresses like a man at a girls high school, she suddenly becomes popular!
A suspicious person has entered school grounds!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Club de chasse ! – Ce qu`on appelle un homme – HENTAI
The Hunting Club! / To Be a Man / Hentai
しゅりょうぶ! / オトコってやつは / HENTAI
